external_references.description: Jansen, W . (2021, January 12). Abusing cloud services to fly under the radar. Retrieved January 19, 2021.

description: [Chimera](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0114) has used the get -b -e -p command for network scanning as well as a custom Python tool packed into a Windows executable named Get.exe to scan IP ranges for HTTP.(Citation: NCC Group Chimera January 2021)
